attributes.action: Stop Concert Tickets being re-sold on the Internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I've lost count now of the times a concert has 'sold out' only to find hundreds of tickets available to buy on other websites for 10 times the price.
It has ruined any chance of paying a fair price for any big concerts just to line the pockets of people who abuse the systems in place.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
